author: Robynn Anton
title: Finalists Announced for the 2015 Fearless Frontline Leader Awards
text:
Finalists for the 2015 Fearless Frontline Leader Awards have been announced. Nominations for this year's award were received from across the country and reviewed by a panel of judges versed in frontline leadership excellence. The event will be held at Great American Ball Park and will include legendary Cincinnati Reds sports announcer, Marty Brennaman, as the featured speaker. The evening is expected to draw a large crowd of manufacturing professionals as well as other industry related guests. “We received many great nominations, so it was difficult to narrow it down,” said Rich Cary, Director of Education Content & Workforce Development, Definity Partners. “The finalists all have compelling stories and are leaders who listen to, empower and respect their teams and coworkers. They deserve to be recognized and celebrated for the example they set for those around them.”
The following Fearless Frontline Leader finalists will be recognized at the awards celebration at Great American Ball Park on October 20th, three honorees will be announced:
George Adair, Allegion of Indianapolis, IN
David Altemuehle, Allegion of Cincinnati, OH
Derek Brooks, Allegion of Indianapolis, IN
Rob Clair, Nisbet Brower of Cincinnati, OH
Brent Downs, Royal Building Products of Columbus, OH
Pam Hughes, VEGA Americas, Inc. of Cincinnati, Ohio
Juan Marmolejo, TrinityRail of Dallas, TX
Glenn McAllister, Fortner, Inc. of Columbus, OH
Mary Pope, Talbert House of Cincinnati, OH
Ron Powell, Kellogg’s of Cincinnati, OH
Bryan Sharpe, Flipside Products, Inc. of Cincinnati, OH
Dusty Stroud, VEGA Americas, Inc. of Cincinnati, OH
Marcus Thomas, Premier Oilfield Equipment Co. of Fort Morgan, CO
Eugene Vassar, Wornick Foods of Cincinnati, OH
The Fearless Frontline Leader Awards celebrate the day-in-day out contributions of the frontline leaders who fuel the manufacturing industry. This year’s festivities include a cocktail hour on the baseball field and in the dugout, ball park tours and the chance for attendees to take a swing in the Reds batting cages. Also joining the celebration is Cincinnati Reds’ former first baseman and outfielder, Todd Benzinger, who will be coaching the batters before they enter the batting cage.
The 2015 Fearless Frontline Leader Awards are proudly sponsored by Definity Partners and other local and national organizations including accounting firm Clark Schaefer Hackett, the Cincinnati Chamber of Commerce, the European American Chamber of Commerce, the Association for Corporate Growth (ACG), Value Added Packaging of Clayton, Ohio, AbeTech of Liberty Township, Ohio, HPWP of Atlanta, GA, and Upside Innovations & Start Something Bold of Cincinnati.
For photos and additional information on each of the finalists, visit http://www.fearlessaward.com/2015-finalists.html .
About the Fearless Frontline Leaders Award:
The Fearless Frontline Leader Awards were initially created to celebrate the memory of Mike Stilwell. Stilwell was a veteran of the manufacturing industry, leading a team at Norris Screen and Manufacturing before his tragic and untimely death due to a four-wheeler accident in 2014. To honor the Fearless Spirit that Mike embodied both on the frontline and with his family the Fearless Frontline Leader Award was established in 2014.
About Definity Partners:
Definity Partners is a leading business improvement firm that works directly with organizations to implement change, delivering rapid results through the Run Improve Grow® (RIG) business model developed by Ray Attiyah and his team at Definity. The RIG approach is to simplify, standardize and automate your organization’s operations through frontline leader empowerment, process improvement, education, technology optimization and cultural change. Definity Partners is headquartered in Cincinnati and works with organizations across the U.S. and Mexico. To learn more, visit DefinityPartners.com or call (513) 381-7200.
